utils module¶

data_fetcher.utils.initialize_accumulator(stations, pollutants)¶

Initialize an accumulator DataFrame with zeros. :type stations: :param stations: List of station names. :type stations: list :type pollutants: :param pollutants: List of pollutant names. :type pollutants: list

Returns:

DataFrame initialized with zeros.

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

data_fetcher.utils.load_yaml(file_path)¶

Load a YAML file and return its contents. :type file_path: :param file_path: Path to the YAML file. :type file_path: str

Returns:

Contents of the YAML file.

Return type:

dict

data_fetcher.utils.plot_bubble_map(dataframe, station_coordinates, title, contaminant='NO2')¶

Plot a bubble map showing the exceedances of a specific contaminant. :type dataframe: :param dataframe: DataFrame containing exceedance data. :type dataframe: pd.DataFrame :type station_coordinates: :param station_coordinates: DataFrame containing station coordinates with columns ‘longitud’ and ‘latitud’. :type station_coordinates: pd.DataFrame :type title: :param title: Title of the bubble map. :type title: str :type contaminant: :param contaminant: Name of the contaminant to plot. Default is ‘NO2’. :type contaminant: str

data_fetcher.utils.plot_heatmap(accumulator, title)¶

Plot a heatmap of the accumulator DataFrame. :type accumulator: :param accumulator: DataFrame to be plotted. :type accumulator: pd.DataFrame :type title: :param title: Title of the heatmap. :type title: str

data_fetcher.utils.plot_heatmap_logscaled(accumulator, title)¶

Plot a log-scaled heatmap of the accumulator DataFrame. :type accumulator: :param accumulator: DataFrame to be plotted. :type accumulator: pd.DataFrame :type title: :param title: Title of the heatmap. :type title: str

data_fetcher.utils.plot_stations_in_map(station_coordinates)¶

Plot the locations of stations on a map. :type station_coordinates: :param station_coordinates: DataFrame containing station coordinates with columns ‘longitud’ and ‘latitud’. :type station_coordinates: pd.DataFrame

Raises:

ValueError – If station_coordinates is None.

data_fetcher.utils.update_accumulator(accumulator, processed_data, stations, pollutants, thresholds)¶

Update the accumulator DataFrame with counts of threshold exceedances. :type accumulator: :param accumulator: DataFrame to be updated. :type accumulator: pd.DataFrame :type processed_data: :param processed_data: DataFrame containing processed data. :type processed_data: pd.DataFrame :type stations: :param stations: List of station names. :type stations: list :type pollutants: :param pollutants: List of pollutant names. :type pollutants: list :type thresholds: :param thresholds: Dictionary of thresholds for each pollutant. :type thresholds: dict

Returns:

Updated accumulator DataFrame.

Return type:

pd.DataFrame

AVDM_pollutants
